name: TETRAFORM (Gilberto Moreno, James Hawkins)
description:
Progress to the end of the level by pulling blocks out of your tetris handheld. Complete lines to get more pull power to pull more blocks out. 

Play in fullscreen for best experience

____________________________________________________________________

Controls: 

WASD to move the player character in the platformer. Arrow Keys to play Tetris once acquired. 
E to pull the currently moving block in Tetris, which you can only do when your pull power is above 0. 
Space to Freeze / Unfreeze last placed Tetris block.
R to reset if Stuck

Left Shift to Pause / Unpause Tetris //BE WARNED you cannot pull a piece with Tetris paused, that would make it lonely.

Thank you for Playing! 😊
we will be working on bugs as they rear their ugly heads
